question: In which year, India hosted its second Asian Games?
explanation: India hosted its second Asian Games in the year 1982. The 9th Asian Games were held from November 19, 1982, to December 4, 1982, in Delhi, India. This was also the first Asiad to be held under the aegis of the Olympic Council of Asia. India first became the host of the first Asian Games in the year 1951.
